content:
All contents on this blog related to CyberSecurity is for educational insights. If testing, ensure it’s on devices you own or are authorized to test. I disclaim responsibility for any misuse, emphasizing educational purposes. I do not endorse criminal activity, and engaging in such activities will lead to criminal charges.
Opinions are my own and do not reflect those of my employer.
summary: All contents on this blog related to CyberSecurity is for educational insights.
title: Disclaimer

content:
Welcome to my blog, where I document research, share insights, and contribute knowledge. With over 17 years in data protection, I’ve dedicated myself to helping companies safeguard their valuable information, handling diverse projects, and navigating disaster recovery scenarios.
At age 15, my interest lies around computer security. Through this blog, I aim to explain concepts used in malware evasion, binary exploitation, and web application security for a broader audience.
Join me on this venture as we explore practical tips for securing company data and demystify methods used by malicious actors. Let’s empower individuals and organizations to fortify their digital defenses.
Training Platform
